entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
